item.description:
This meetup is a "go" with 4 "yes" RSVP's by Wednesday prior. The Manhan Trail is a 4 mile scenic paved trail that winds through Easthampton and provides a variety of stopping off opportunities. We will pass by Arcadia Wildlife Sanctuary, which has five miles of walking trails, The Manhan Cafe, which boasts Fair Trade Coffee and pastries, the Blue Moon whole foods Cafe, and the Eastworks Marketplace. Bringables: bike lock, water, $$, binoculars. Here are some URL's for directions and the local color: http://www.traillink....
http://www.massaudubo...
http://easthamptonweb...
http://www.bluemoongr...
http://www.eastworks-...
In the case of RAIN or forecasted rain I will send out a message by 9:45 to advance cancel due to weather.
item.how_to_find_us: We will meet at the Ferry St. parking lot. Click on the traillink URL under meeting "details" for directions. I have a green bicycle
item.why: Why not? You can get in shape, try something new, enjoy pleasant company and surroundings...and it's free! (But you may want to bring $4 for Arcadia or lunch/coffee money).
item.name: Manhan Trail Adult Bike Ride
